traits.Camouflage: The jaculi has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.
traits.Keen Smell: The jaculi has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Spring: The jaculi springs up to 30 feet in a straight line and makes a bite attack against a target within its reach. This attack has advantage if the jaculi springs at least 10 feet. If the attack hits, the bite deals an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.
